whisper room - rehearsal with the DAP Lab

A sequence of dance scenes, in preparation of the new kimosphere installation “Transparent Eclipse” by DAP-Lab, to be premiered at ISEA 2019 in Gwangju, Korea.

Scenography & camera: Johannes Birringer dance/choreography: Zhi Xu sound and interactive sound synthesis: Kat Macdonald.
